name: Norman (SkywardGames)
description:
A Simple 2D Roguelike about Norman, a man stripped of everything he owns and thrown into a dungeon to rot, if he fails his judgement is complete, but if he succeeds he is pardoned for his crimes. Norman must face a host of strange monsters to descend through the dungeon.

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Attack

B - Block

N - Alt attack

Features

Face 9 levels of monsters including bosses 

Conquer deadly traps and traverse a subterranean nightmare.

Original Soundtrack 

Help save Norman!
